00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORSENDBUFFER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORSENDBUFFER_H

00025 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"
00026 
00027 #include "TableMutatorCompletionCounter.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   struct FailedRegion {
00032     int error;
00033     uint8_t *base;
00034     uint32_t len;
00035   };
00036 
00040   class TableMutatorSendBuffer : public ReferenceCount {
00041   public:
00042     TableMutatorSendBuffer(const TableIdentifier *tid,
00043         TableMutatorCompletionCounter *cc, RangeLocator *rl)
00044       : counterp(cc), send_count(0), retry_count(0), m_table_identifier(tid),
00045         m_range_locator(rl) { }
00046 
00047     void add_retries(uint32_t count, uint32_t offset, uint32_t len) {
00048       accum.add(pending_updates.base+offset, len);
00049       counterp->set_retries();
00050       retry_count += count;
00051       // invalidate row key
00052       SerializedKey key(pending_updates.base+offset);
00053       m_range_locator->invalidate(m_table_identifier, key.row());
00054     }
00055     void add_retries_all() {
00056       accum.add(pending_updates.base, pending_updates.size);
00057       counterp->set_retries();
00058       retry_count = send_count;
00059       // invalidate row key
00060       SerializedKey key(pending_updates.base);
00061       m_range_locator->invalidate(m_table_identifier, key.row());
00062     }
00063     void add_errors(int error, uint32_t count, uint32_t offset, uint32_t len) {
00064       FailedRegion failed;
00065       (void)count;
00066       failed.error = error;
00067       failed.base = pending_updates.base + offset;
00068       failed.len = len;
00069       failed_regions.push_back(failed);
00070       counterp->set_errors();
00071     }
00072     void add_errors_all(uint32_t error) {
00073       FailedRegion failed;
00074       failed.error = (int)error;
00075       failed.base = pending_updates.base;
00076       failed.len = pending_updates.size;
00077       failed_regions.push_back(failed);
00078       counterp->set_errors();
00079     }
00080     void clear() {
00081       key_offsets.clear();
00082       accum.clear();
00083       pending_updates.free();
00084       failed_regions.clear();
00085       send_count = 0;
00086       retry_count = 0;
00087     }
00088     void reset() {
00089       clear();
00090       dispatch_handler = 0;
00091     }
00092     void get_failed_regions(std::vector<FailedRegion> &errors) {
00093       errors.insert(errors.end(), failed_regions.begin(), failed_regions.end());
00094     }
00095 
00096     bool resend() { return retry_count > 0; }
00097 
00098     std::vector<uint64_t> key_offsets;
00099     DynamicBuffer accum;
00100     StaticBuffer pending_updates;
00101     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00102     TableMutatorCompletionCounter *counterp;
00103     DispatchHandlerPtr dispatch_handler;
00104     std::vector<FailedRegion> failed_regions;
00105     uint32_t send_count;
00106     uint32_t retry_count;
00107 
00108   private:
00109     const TableIdentifier *m_table_identifier;
00110     RangeLocator *m_range_locator;
00111   };
00112 
00113   typedef intrusive_ptr<TableMutatorSendBuffer> TableMutatorSendBufferPtr;
00114 
00115 } // namespace Hypertable
